values.name: Mishon Welton Estate Agents
values.description:
What ever you are looking for in your Hove Property.... let us help you find it..

A leading independent estate agent located in prominent Church Road, Hove. If you are thinking of moving in and around Hove contact us today to find our how we can help you with your move.

values.name: Sussex Funeral Services
values.description: We are an independent Funeral Directors based in Hove, East Sussex.  We offer a complete funerary service providing all aspects of funeral care and arrangements beginning from the moment you contact us. We are able to provide services for a variety of different religions and belief systems, and will always respect your wishes.

QualitySolicitors Howlett Clarke is a modern legal practice providing a full range of services and professional representation in all main areas of law.

Our legal services offers a diverse range to satisfy Brighton and Hove's ever expanding commercial and consumer population. This can range from, large corporations to middle market companies, community matters and not-for-profit organizations to individuals and emerging businesses. 

As the dynamics of business, economics, technology, and communications have become increasingly complex, so has the practice of law. To combat this we initially offer a free 30 minute meeting for any client who has a possible legal enquiry. We believe that the best results are achieved by recruiting and drawing on our lawyers exceptional talents and varied experiences.

We currently have offices in Brighton and Hove as well as Legal Access Points located in the WH Smith branch's of Brighton, Hove and Worthing. Collaboratively we assist our clients in achieving their personal and business goals, structuring, negotiating and closing transactions, and handling disputed matters.  
  
Even though our firm is the longest standing practice in Brighton (est 1773) we still aim to become trusted advisors that clients can depend upon to deliver excellent legal counseling. This and other factors have proven to consolidate our long-standing relationships with a vast majority of our clients, having counseled numerous businesses for decades and to affirm our dependability and dedication.
values.name: Quality Solicitors Howlett Clarke

values.description:
Nimbus Accounting, Accountants in Brighton & Hove - www.nimbusaccounting.com

We provide a bespoke accounting service to our clients in Brighton & Hove, Sussex and beyond.  Our specialist knowledge is specifically focused on small businesses. We deliver our clients an excellent service and keep them up to date with the current legislation which may impact their business. 

At our core is a dedicated team of qualified accountants who strive for customer satisfaction and delivering the best tax planning strategies for our clients.

We have developed a robust system to keep in constant contact with our clients, ensuring no deadlines are missed. We take personal pride in working with our clients and will ensure as we continue to grow that this culture remains.
values.name: Nimbus Accounting

values.description:
Providing Tennis Coaching Courses for children in Brighton and Hove aged between 4 and 12 years.  Offeing after school clubs at Downs Infants, Stanford Infants and Brighton and Hove.  Mini Tennis Tournament programme in Brighton and Hove.  Tennis Coaching courses for those who want to learn to become tennis coaches held regularly in Dyke Road Tennis Courts in Brighton.

Additional services include:

Weekend Tennis coaching courses every weekend in Preston Park, Brighton.  Open to children from 4 to 12 years 10am to 12pm. Drop in available.

Holiday Booster courses held in Preston Park , Brighton. 10am to 12 noon Monday to Friday.  Any combination of days available.

values: After School Club Tennis Coaching Courses in Brighton
Tennis Qualification Coaching Courses in Brighton
Holiday Booster Tennis Sessions in Brighton

values.name: Tennis Tigers

values.description: I set up the Unique to Brighton directory in 2005. Its locational data has now been reconfigured as a map for general interest only. The map is not a list of recommendations nor does it attempt to include all of the lovely specialist & independent places that you can find all across Brighton & Hove.
values.name: Unique to Brighton

values.description:
Callaways are based in Sussex on the south coast with brand new offices in Worthing, and further along the coast in Hove. Our property team provides knowledge and experience to help build lasting and profitable relationships with both developers and house buying clients. We combine a wealth of experience and expertise across the fields of new and re-sale homes, letting properties, overseas property sales and marketing services.

We pride ourselves on having the ability to differentiate ourselves from other Brighton & Hove Estate Agents by offering services direct from our sister company, Land & Brand New Homes. Callaways also strides ahead in front of Brighton & Hove Letting Agents by offering unique packages for Landlords and Tenants with the aim of providing the highest level of service possible. By achieving these high standards Callaways are proud winners of the UK Residential Property Award for best estate agency service.
values.name: Callaways Estate and Lettings Agent
NHS Brighton and Hove
values.description:
NHS Brighton and Hove is the new name we use instead of Brighton and Hove City Teaching Primary Care Trust, as it’s a more accurate description of us as an organisation.

Although much of our work still concerns primary care practitioners (GPs, pharmacists, optometrists and dentists) we do a lot of other things too, as we explain below.

Put simply, we aim to help people live healthily and stay well, and make sure that high quality care is provided for them when they become unwell.

values.name: City College Brighton and Hove
values.description:
City College Brighton and Hove is a vocational training and skills college set in the heart of Brighton.

The College offers hundreds of full time and part time courses including entry level, Foundation and Adult learning, accreditation and professional training options.

Our College is one of the most diverse in the country, attracting students from all ages and backgrounds, from 14 years to 80 and beyond, attracting nearly 9,000 students.

In addition to this, we also specialise in offering professional training to companies and employers of all sizes. Many of our courses are either subsidised or you can access financing for an affordable learning solution.

Aside from being a successful College, we promise you a great learning experience. We are committed to supporting and helping you throughout your time with us.

AudioBeach Studios is Brighton & Hove's newest, and best, recording studio for all types of bands, groups and solo artists.

AudioBeach Studios was set up in November 2009 by producers Forbes Coleman (Spitefire, My Red Angel, Amanda Shaw, Franny, Andy Walker) and Jez Larder, who has worked on tracks by David Bowie, Simply Red, Estelle and more recently One Eskimo and Amy MacDonald.

AudioBeach Studios provides an affordable professional 48 track recording and live sound service. The studio will have a great size live room and sound booth and will cater for all types of bands and artists.

As part of AudioBeach Studios's commitment to promoting new talent, we offer discounted recording sessions to unsigned artists and young musicians at just £160 per day for a recording session.

The studio benefit's from ample, nearby low priced pay-and-display parking as well as being near a large cheap multi-storey carpark in Norton Road, Hove and is situated minutes away from Brighton and Hove stations.
values.name: AudioBeach Studios

values.description:
Høve Støtt is the natural choice when you want to do something active in Geilo. We offer unique locations, products, experiences and activities at any time. Many call us an event agency, but we are more then that. We are an experience producer!

All our activities and experiences are nature based and approved by Norsk Økoturisme (Norwegian Eco tourism). There is a strong focus on being part of the nature during our activities and we have a truly local connection!

We are known for our good mood and one of our strengths is beeing host. Høve Støtt is professional and creative in all aspects. From product development, planning and coordination to arrange your arrangement
values.name: Høve Støtt as

values.description:
Velkommen til Aktiv 3`s profil på Linkedin !

Her er vi i kontakt  med private ejendomsinvestorer, ejendomsadministration, pensionskasser og andre af vores kunder. Vi har naturligvis en generel interesse i ejendomme, så arktitekter, ejendomsmægler osv, er også noget vi kan lide at stikke vores næse ned i.

Aktiv 3 udfører ejendomsservice ( facility management, viceværtservice), trappevask, snerydning og kontorrengøring i København og omegn. 

Hvis du mener vi skal give dig et godt, uforpligtende, tilbud på ovenstående arbejdsområder. Så kontakt os gerne, og find ud af hvorfor vi har eksisteret siden 1999, og stadig vokser.

mvh

Jimi Hove
Aktiv 3
http://www.aktiv3.dk/
values.name: Aktiv 3 - Ejendomsservice Snerydning Facility Management i København
Jo Offer Creative Services
values.description:
My own art practice combines the use of digital skills with hand-rendered type, pattern, collage and print-making to create illustrative images and graphic design solutions for a broad range of clients.

Commissions include Brighton & Hove Council, Brighton & Hove Primary Care trust, Brighton & Hove buses and Simon Carter Accessories. 

Visualisation of ideas and concepts
Storyboarding and narrative illustration
Characterisation
Brand development and application.
Print pricing and production

Our vision is to create a society in which the most vulnerable people are valued and have the opportunity to achieve quality of life and well-being. 

Impetus uses volunteers and volunteering as a way to provides direct support services to local people experiencing disability and/or disadvantage. We currently work primarily with older people and adults with learning disability providing befriending services, advocacy, and representation on issues relating to health and wellbeing. 

We also provide infrastructure support to organisations within the voluntary sector through the Volunteer Centre and the Performance Development Service.

values: Mentoring & befriending services for older people
Advocacy & support for people with learning difficulties
Representation & voice on health & wellbeing issues

values.name: Brighton & Hove Impetus

values.description:
When you join the Brighton & Hove Chamber of Commerce you become part of one of the City’s most effective business groups, and by joining you add another business with which others can engage. You can share your knowledge and expertise, and in turn you get access to a new business network from which you can benefit. 

What does the Chamber do?
The Chamber is the voice of the City’s business people, and it’s a voice that really helps its members build successful businesses. We have a reputation for providing high-quality networking opportunities and delivering a wide-ranging syllabus of inspirational advice and effective training.

As well as helping local businesses to grow and prosper, we represent our members on the larger political and economic stage too, working closely with local agencies, including the Council, on issues like business legislation, building programmes and regional transport.
values.name: Brighton and Hove Chamber of Commerce

values.description:
Hove Therapy Centre opened in April 2009 and we pride ourselves on being a collective of specialised practitioners each focusing on a specific range of holistic and complementary therapies.
An example of the therapies we currently specialise in are massage, hypnotherapy, herbal medicine, counselling and homeopathy treating a wide range of common ailmets such as stress, depression, muscular fatigue and phobias.

The centre offers individuals the chance to explore their health and goals in a supportive environment whilst offering the opportunity to take part in our many talks, workshops and open days held throughout the year. 

We work hard to build relationships within the local community and to raise the awareness of our practice and at the same time offering you all the chance to feel relaxed, focused and full of health after visiting us.
values.name: Hove Therapy Centre
Edeo Interactive Ltd
values.description:
Edeo Interactive Ltd is an Active business incorporated in England & Wales on 8th February 2010.
Their business activity is recorded as Other Information Technology Service Activities

Registered Address
Unit 11 Hove Business Centre, Fonthill Road, Hove, East Sussex, Bn3 6ha

The Kitchen Store is a designer and installer of beautiful kitchens throughout Sussex.. We have two flagship showrooms one in Brighton & Hove and the other at our manufacturing plant in Lancing, Sussex.

Established in 2004, we are UK retail Distributor for Manhattan Furniture and Paula Rosa kitchens supplying customers throughout the South and nationwide.

As experts in the Manhattan and Paula Rosa current and back catalogues, we also sell furniture parts, accessories and appliances to existing kitchen owners throughout the UK who wish to add, extend, upgrade or renew their existing kitchens.

In 2013 we were proud to be Finalists in the Brighton and Hove Business Awards

*Best Customer Service
*Best Independent Retailer
*Managing Director of the Year
values.name: The Kitchen Store (Retail) Ltd.

values.description:
If you think Age Concern is only for the very elderly, think again - we are for everyone over the age of 50 and also for these who support or care for those over this age.

   As our local City Council faces reductions of at least 28% over the next 4 years it is inevitable that those who are struggling to stay independent in their own homes will get less support from the Council, and Health, and they will turn to us even more. Our values mean that this organisation will not simply cut and reduce services, in fact the Board of Trustees have been clear that we must prioritise any savings so that protect our direct delivery to the client group.

   What we know for sure is that whatever the Big Society is, a concept that is such an important part of the Prime Ministers' thinking; it cannot be achieved without organisations like ours. Otherwise, yet again, older people and their local groups will be left behind because older people do not shout or work in `sound bites'.



   The people we work with are not lonely victims they are funny, rude, outrageous and only limited by the society in which they live. If we all want them to enjoy their lives we can choose for that to happen.
values.name: Age Concern Brighton Hove & Portslade
